creditline: Gift of David and Mary Parker
description: 3 boys wearing hats with British flag design; another child in foreground hidden behind a flag picturing Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson
markings: \'Royal Wedding Day (Prince Andrew and Lady Sarah Ferguson), Off Carlisle Circus, Belfast, 1986\', on label taped to back of frame; \'#11\', in black marker, on back of frame
title: Royal Wedding Day (Prince Andrew and Lady Sarah Ferguson), Off Carlisle Circus, Belfast
